Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Painted a deep shade of hunter green, the tall support beam in the northeast corner of the stall to which the half-height walls have been affixed extends up to the high ceiling above.

Painted a deep shade of hunter green, the tall support beams in the corners of the stall to which the half-height walls have been affixed extend up to the high ceiling above.
Painted a deep shade of hunter green, the tall support beams in the corners of the stall to which the half-height walls have been affixed extend up to the high ceiling above.
the hay strewn about the floor
A thick layer of hay has been strewn about the dark red stone floor.
the hunter green east wall

Six feet in height and twelve feet in width, the east wall of this stall is crafted from planks of pine sanded smooth and painted a deep shade of hunter green. Aligned horizontally, the planks are affixed on either end to a matching support beam which extends up to the high ceiling above. Two additional planks in a contrasting cream color are fastened crossways to the surface to reinforce the half-height wall.

the hunter green west wall

Six feet in height and twelve feet in width, the west wall of this stall is crafted from planks of pine sanded smooth and painted a deep shade of hunter green. Aligned horizontally, the planks are affixed on either end to a matching support beam which extends up to the high ceiling above. the hunter green walls

Six feet in height and twelve feet in width, the walls of this stall are crafted from planks of pine sanded smooth and painted a deep shade of hunter green. Aligned horizontally, the planks are affixed on either end to a matching support beam which extends up to the high ceiling above. Two additional planks in a contrasting cream color are fastened crossways to the four surfaces to reinforce each half-height wall.
